verses.verse: וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> vi-ho-Shu-a' Now Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2204><s%> za-Ken, was old בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba [and] stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim; in years וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You זָקַ֙נְתָּה֙ <S%H2204><s%> za-Kan-tah unto him Thou art old בָּ֣אתָ <S%H935><s%> Ba-ta [and] stricken בַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> vai-ya-Mim, in years וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz land נִשְׁאֲרָ֥ה <S%H7604><s%> nish-'a-Rah and there remaineth הַרְבֵּֽה־ <S%H7235><s%> har-beh- much מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od yet very לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah. to be possessed

זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz This [is] the land הַנִּשְׁאָ֑רֶת <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'A-ret; that yet remaineth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all גְּלִיל֥וֹת <S%H1552><s%> ge-li-Lot all the borders הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> hap-pe-lish-Tim of the Philistines וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַגְּשׁוּרִֽי׃ <S%H1651><s%> hag-ge-shu-Ri. and all Geshuri

מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשִּׁיח֞וֹר <S%H7883><s%> hash-shi-Chor From Sihor אֲשֶׁ֣ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei which [is] before מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egypt וְעַ֨ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad far גְּב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul even unto the borders עֶקְרוֹן֙ <S%H6138><s%> 'ek-rOn of Ekron צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah, northward לַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> lak-ke-na-'a-Ni to the Canaanite תֵּחָשֵׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> te-cha-Shev; [which] is counted חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת׀ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Me-shet five סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> sar-Nei lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines הָעַזָּתִ֤י <S%H5841><s%> ha-'az-za-Ti the Gazathites וְהָאַשְׁדּוֹדִי֙ <S%H796><s%> ve-ha-'ash-do-Di and the Ashdothites הָאֶשְׁקְלוֹנִ֣י <S%H832><s%> ha-'esh-ke-lo-Ni the Eshkalonites הַגִּתִּ֔י <S%H1663><s%> hag-git-Ti, the Gittites וְהָעֶקְרוֹנִ֖י <S%H6139><s%> ve-ha-'ek-ro-Ni and the Ekronites וְהָעַוִּֽים׃ <S%H5757><s%> ve-ha-'av-Vim. Avims

מִתֵּימָ֞ן <S%H8486><s%> mit-tei-Man From the south כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz all the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, of the Canaanites וּמְעָרָ֛ה <S%H4632><s%> u-me-'a-Rah and Mearah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that לַצִּידֹנִ֖ים <S%H6722><s%> latz-tzi-do-Nim that [is] beside the Sidonians עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far אֲפֵ֑קָה <S%H663><s%> 'a-Fe-kah; unto Aphek עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul to the borders הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri. of the Amorites

וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz And the land הַגִּבְלִ֗י <S%H1382><s%> hag-giv-Li, of the Giblites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-nOn and all Lebanon מִזְרַ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> miz-Rach east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh, east side מִבַּ֣עַל mib-Ba-'al גָּ֔ד <S%H1171><s%> Gad, from Baalgad תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat below הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- under mount חֶרְמ֑וֹן <S%H2768><s%> cher-Mon; Hermon עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far לְב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> le-Vo unto the entering חֲמָֽת׃ <S%H2574><s%> cha-Mat. into Hamath

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei All the inhabitants הָ֠הָר <S%H2022><s%> Ha-hor of the hill country מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַלְּבָנ֞וֹן <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-Non from Lebanon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far מִשְׂרְפֹ֥ת mis-re-Fot מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4956><s%> ma-yim unto Misrephothmaim כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all צִ֣ידֹנִ֔ים <S%H6722><s%> tzi-do-Nim, [and] all the Sidonians אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אוֹרִישֵׁ֔ם <S%H3423><s%> o-ri-Shem, them will I drive out מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel רַ֠ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but הַפִּלֶ֤הָ <S%H5307><s%> hap-pi-Le-ha only divide thou it by lot לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El unto the Israelites בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-Lah, for an inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I צִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Ti-cha. as I have commanded

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now חַלֵּ֞ק <S%H2505><s%> chal-Lek Now therefore divide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot for בְּנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-Lah for an inheritance לְתִשְׁעַ֣ת <S%H8672><s%> le-tish-'At unto the nine הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <S%H7626><s%> hash-she-va-Tim; tribes וַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and the half הַשֵּׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> hash-She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> Ham-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh

עִמּ֗וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo, the other הָרֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> ha-r-'u-ve-Ni With whom the Reubenites וְהַגָּדִ֔י <S%H1425><s%> ve-hag-ga-Di, and the Gadites לָקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam; their inheritance אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, which Moses בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver them beyond הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, eastward כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh [even] as Moses עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <S%H6177><s%> me-'a-ro-'Er From Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> se-fat- that [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <S%H769><s%> ar-Non Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> ve-ha-'Ir and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> be-toch- that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal of the river וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַמִּישֹׁ֥ר <S%H4334><s%> ham-mi-Shor and all the plain מֵידְבָ֖א <S%H4311><s%> meid-Va of Medeba עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far דִּיבֽוֹן׃ <S%H1769><s%> di-Von. unto Dibon

וְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol, and all עָרֵי֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei And all the cities סִיחוֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> si-chOn of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach which reigned בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> be-chesh-Bon; in Heshbon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul unto the border בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon. of Ammon

וְהַגִּלְעָ֞ד <S%H1568><s%> ve-hag-gil-'Ad And Gilead וּגְב֧וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul and the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֣י <S%H1651><s%> hag-ge-shu-Ri of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֗י <S%H4602><s%> ve-ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti, and Maachathites וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har and all mount חֶרְמ֛וֹן <S%H2768><s%> cher-Mon Hermon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan and all Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far סַלְכָֽה׃ <S%H5548><s%> sal-Chah. unto Salcah

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַמְלְכ֥וּת <S%H4468><s%> mam-le-Chut All the kingdom עוֹג֙ <S%H5747><s%> 'Og of Og בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> bab-ba-Shan, in Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach which reigned בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <S%H6252><s%> be-'ash-ta-Rot in Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <S%H154><s%> u-ve-'ed-Re-'i; and in Edrei ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he נִשְׁאַר֙ <S%H7604><s%> nish-'Ar who remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> mi-Ye-ter of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֔ים <S%H7497><s%> ha-re-fa-'Im, of the giants וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Kem smite מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh for these did Moses וַיֹּרִשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H3423><s%> vai-yo-ri-Shem. and cast them out

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not הוֹרִ֙ישׁוּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> ho-Ri-shu expelled בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Nevertheless the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <S%H1651><s%> hag-ge-shu-Ri not the Geshurites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <S%H4602><s%> ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti; nor the Maachathites וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev dwell גְּשׁ֤וּר <S%H1650><s%> ge-Shur but the Geshurites וּמַֽעֲכָת֙ <S%H4601><s%> u-ma-'a-Chat and the Maachathites בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev among יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, the Israelites עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom until this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but לְשֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> le-She-vet Only unto the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> hal-le-Vi, of Levi לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not נָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan he gave נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah; none inheritance אִשֵּׁ֨י <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-To, [are] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- as he said לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten gave מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh unto the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. [inheritance] according to their families

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become לָהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like הַגְּב֗וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul, And their coast מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <S%H6177><s%> me-'a-ro-'Er was from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> se-fat- that [is] on the bank נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <S%H769><s%> ar-Non Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> ve-ha-'Ir and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> be-toch- that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal of the river וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַמִּישֹׁ֖ר <S%H4334><s%> ham-mi-Shor and all the plain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by מֵידְבָֽא׃ <S%H4311><s%> mei-de-Va. by Medeba

חֶשְׁבּ֥וֹן <S%H2809><s%> chesh-Bon Heshbon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all עָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei-ha and all her cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּמִּישֹׁ֑ר <S%H4334><s%> bam-mi-Shor; that [are] in the plain דִּיבוֹן֙ <S%H1769><s%> di-Von Dibon וּבָמ֣וֹת u-va-Mot בַּ֔עַל <S%H1120><s%> Ba-'al, and Bamothbaal וּבֵ֖ית u-Veit בַּ֥עַל Ba-'al מְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1010><s%> me-'on. and Bethbaalmeon
וְיַ֥הְצָה <S%H3096><s%> ve-Yah-tzah And Jahazah וּקְדֵמֹ֖ת <S%H6932><s%> u-ke-de-Mot and Kedemoth וּמֵפָֽעַת׃ <S%H4158><s%> u-me-Fa-'at. and Mephaath
